entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
